text: Ferdinand "Fernand" Ghesquière (1 March 1933 – 1 March 2021) was a Belgian politician. He was a member of the Christian Social Party. He was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1985 to 1987 and between 1991 and 1999. He was a member of the Senate from 1987 to 1991. Ghesquière was born in Ostend and died in the same place, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== *Ghesquière at vlaamsparlement.be *Ghesquière at oostende.be Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Christelijke Volkspartij politicians Category:Flemish politicians Category:People from West Flanders
title: Ferdinand Ghesquière
